芛字的基本解释

芛
wěi
初生的草木花。

芛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》羊捶切，上紙，以。］
“茟2”的今字。
草木花初生。

芛字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　芛； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1019第11
〔古文〕茟【說文】羊捶切【集韻】尹捶切【正韻】烏捶切，?音䔺。【爾雅·釋草】渝、芛、葟、華，榮。【註】此別草木榮華之異名也，俗呼草木華初生者爲芛，音䝐。　又【集韻】聳尹切，音笋。又食律切，音述。【廣韻】餘律切，音聿。義?同。

芛字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
芛字的起名意思

草木花初生。

Chrysanthemum
Basic explanation of words
Chrysanthemum
wěi
Newborn plants and flowers.
Chrysanthemum
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guangyun" sheep beating and cutting, loading paper, with. ]
The present character for "茟2".
Plants and flowers are born.
Chrysanthemum
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　芛; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1019-11
〔Ancient Chinese】茟【Said the text】Sheep beat and cut 【Jiyun】Yin beat and cut 【Zheng Yun】Wu beat and cut,? Yin. 【Erya·Shicao】Yu, Qiang, Jiao, Hua, Rong. [Note] This is also a synonym for the grass and woods glory, and the people who are born in the grass and woods are commonly called 芛, and the sound is 䝐.　 [Ji Yun] Shing Yin Qi, sound bamboo shoots. And the food law cuts, the sound is stated. [Guang Yun] Yu Lv cut, sound Yu. Righteous? Same.

Name meaning
Plants and flowers are born.
wěi, sǔn
сущ.
1) wěi бутон
2) sǔn вм. 笋 (молодые ростки бамбука; бамбук)
3) sǔn см. 笋 (конус, конический)
